programme.title: Shin's Project
programme.desc: Mr. Shin, an ordinary chicken shop owner who could settles everything with his silver tongue, team up with his delivery rider and a rookie judge to seek new ground for justice.

programme.title: Iron Girls 2

programme.title: The Zookeeper's Wife

programme.title: Tiger On Beat

programme.title: Mile 22

programme.title: The Golden Holiday

programme.title: The Canton Godfather
programme.desc: A country boy becomes the head of a gang through the purchase of some lucky roses from an old lady.

programme.title: Extreme Job
programme.desc: Narcotics detectives work under cover in a chicken joint to try and bust a gang of organized criminals.

programme.title: Pee Nak 3
programme.desc: A young gravedigger at Thamma Nakanimitr temple, unearths an ancient gold anklet from a tomb dated back to World War II. He decided to pocket the anklet and falls prey to a curse that turns his skin scaly, the likes of a snake.

programme.title: My Lovely Angel
programme.desc: A life-changing story of a man who has lived as a loner his entire life. Jae Shik begins to live together with a child with a hearing-visual disability, as they change each other's lives and try to find a way to communicate.

programme.title: Necromancer

programme.title: Hitman

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A former notorious gangster sets out to find his abducted wife and take down her kidnappers

programme.title: Bring Me Home

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After getting caught at the border, Boss, Tim, JJ, and Pip have to organize an escape from a “former novelty restaurant turned interrogation facility” using only the four phone calls they’ve been given. Meanwhile, Tina has a plan for Dez to infiltrate the criminal baby organization to break them up from the inside, but it’s complicated when Tina’s new assistant Temp Baby Aubrey accidentally takes over Dez’s undercover baby criminal role.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss scours Chicago to find his old co-worker nemesis Board Member Bradley, his key to cutting a deal with the Federal Agents for his freedom. However, he must lose the tail of Canada’s most notorious fugitive tracker, a trained bear cub named Henri. Meanwhile, Tina is trapped at home with her paranoid grandma Yaya, forced to prove to her that she’s not a criminal baby like the news is causing Yaya to believe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: The Templeton’s hometown is overtaken by baby criminals, with Temp Baby Aubrey in charge. Boss has 48 hours to somehow restore them all to adulthood and turn them in, or face jail time himself. With Tina now acting like a dark angel of vengeance after feeling betrayed by Aubrey, Boss is forced to assemble a team from unlikely odd friends. Together, they launch a final mission to settle old scores and clear Boss Baby’s name.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Struggling to find their purpose on the Betterman farm, the Croods see an opportunity to prove their worth by harvesting Phil’s perilous (and sticky) bounceberries.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: The crew gets their first ping on their new creature-helping app! A dried up jellyfish-type creature has been discovered at a construction site, and the anti-creature contractor wants it GONE. The crew try taking Jelleen to the sewers to live with Sewer Koi, but the unhappy creature creates a blackout in the sewers with its magical electric charge. Realizing that Jelleen should be able to stay in her original home, the crew must stand up against the contractor and force her to see the error of her ways… or else!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: When a mysterious creature keeps stealing people’s prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yi’s prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room…), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who’s positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew’s pursuits. When Everest doesn’t return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi’s intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the others debate how to keep the dragons a secret, even as a rambunctious young “cloaking” dragon gets loose in town and pursues a friendship with a reluctant Alex.

Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yi’s prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room…), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who’s positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew’s pursuits. When Everest doesn’t return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi’s intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge

programme.title: Where's Wally?

programme.title: All Hail King Julien

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! / When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yi’s building. Their distress grows upon discovering that this “Qilin” isn’t an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.desc: Lola, Dylan and Cassie have tickets to the carnival, but when Dylan loses his ticket, the Dew Drops set out to find it. / When Phoebe accidentally gets tossed into Nicholas' diaper bag before a trip to the park, Phoebe has to help a baby bird, while Eden and Athena must help Marcus rehearse for his big concert.

programme.desc: When Rodney draws and writes his own comic book, TZG secretly helps him transport it to the comic book store where creator Ken KaBlam is on the hunt for new talent. / When Ken KaBlam gets homesick for his own hometown of Crostonburg, TZG secretly recreates the things me misses in Harmony Harbor.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Grey Men 2
programme.desc: Triad boss Song seeks to whitewash his image and seize Laika’s mayoral seat amid the regime change. Despite colluding with officials, he faces a funding shortfall. To bolster his power, Song’s right-hand man and enforcer resort to violent crimes. Just as Song believes success is within reach, the dynamics among the three take an unexpected turn…

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join award-winning Malaysian actress Siti Saleha and her husband as they explore the city by day and venture into the night, discovering its vibrant culture and hidden treasures.

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join Filipino actor, model and swimmer Enchong Dee and his celebrity friend Ria, to explore the highs and lows of Hong Kong. They are eager to push their boundaries in this thrilling new adventure.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Punish Evil
programme.desc: A shipment of newly issued currency is robbed by three armed robbers, prompting Detective Chang to investigate. Following new leads, he successfully takes down one of the robbers. Meanwhile, the other two plot to rob a gold factory amidst the chaos. With meticulous planning, Chang thwarts their scheme and brings them to justice.

programme.title: Iron Squad W

Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Hua’s hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: Wusong VS Ximenqing
programme.desc: Wu Song finds out about his sister-in-law’s affair with a rich man, Ximen Qing. Qing sets Song up and have him exiled for a year, during which his hapless brother is murdered and cremated. When Song finally returns home, he takes the case to court but the judge brushes it aside and closes it abruptly. Can Song finally avenge his brother’s death?

programme.title: CSI S5 E22 - Weeping Willows
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage S1 17
programme.desc: Georgie’s attempt to break up Missy and her new boyfriend backfires.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 23
programme.desc: Sal, Murr, Joe and Q give all-you-can eat buffet customers all they can handle and turn into real power tools while teaching workshops at a hardware store. Then, the big loser suffers a punishment that will make your skin crawl.

programme.title: The Closer S7 14
programme.desc: The LAPD's police commissioner (MARK MOSES) and his wife (ELIZABETH PERKINS) may be in trouble when Brenda determines to uncover a scandal one of them tried to cover up.

programme.title: Arrow S2 15
programme.desc: As Oliver brings Sara into the team, Felicity starts to feel left out. To prove her worth, she goes after a villain named William Tockman, a.k.a. The Clock King (ROBERT KNEPPER).

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 4
programme.desc: When Howard returns from space, he doesn’t get the hero’s welcome he expected. Meanwhile, Game Night turns into a battle of the sexes.

programme.title: Friends S6 24
programme.desc: Chandler's romantic marriage proposal is ruined when Monica's former boyfriend returns. (Part 1)

programme.title: The Mentalist S5 2
programme.desc: While the CBI team investigates the murder of a diamond cutter, Jane meets a girl who claims to be his late daughter, Charlotte (guest star DOVE CAMERON).

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 169
programme.desc: In our fast-moving world, we unpack the latest in politics, shifting national affairs and the global events shaping our lives. Guest host Melissa Clarke asks the tough questions on the big issues to the key decision makers.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien - Episode 169
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: A Bite To Eat With Alice - Kathy Lette
programme.desc: Alice makes a dish inspired by a retro Aussie snack made famous by her guest, celebrated author and Aussie ex-pat, Kathy Lette. Kathy teaches Alice how to throw an extravagant dinner party as they cook a seafood dish.

programme.title: The Pacific - PNG 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: A special episode of The Pacific celebrating the 50th anniversary of PNG's independence. Join us as we reflect on 50 years of nationhood - the successes, and the challenges - plus what comes next for PNG in the years ahead.

programme.title: ABC National News - Episode 261
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 - Episode 148
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus analysis from 7.30's Political Editor Jacob Greber.

programme.title: Ambulance Australia - Episode 1
programme.desc: Exclusive access is granted within the greater Brisbane area to the Queensland Ambulance Services, following emergencies from the heart of the operations centre to the critical decisions of paramedics on the front line.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - My Garden Path - Rob Blakers
programme.desc: We head down the garden path with Rob Blakers, a photographer whose love of natural places and process has inspired the garden he cultivates for his local community.

programme.title: The World - Episode 148
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: Abebe - Butterfly Song
programme.desc: An exploration and celebration of the enduring cross-cultural friendship between Papua New Guinea's most celebrated singer-songwriter George Telek and acclaimed Australian musician David Bridie.

programme.title: Australia In Colour - Crime and Punishment
programme.desc: Modern Australia is founded on the back of British convicts; crime and punishment, murder and mayhem, is part of its DNA.

programme.title: Voices of Independence - Sir Moi Avei
programme.desc: Sir Moi Avei has served many ministerial roles in PNG, most notably, he was the deputy prime minister under Sir Michael Somare.

programme.title: ABC Late News - Episode 187
programme.desc: Follow the latest on today's news, covering what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow in Perth.

programme.title: The Business - Episode 136
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, investors, employees and businesses big and small. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: Ambulance Australia - Episode 1
programme.desc: Exclusive access is granted within the greater Brisbane area to the Queensland Ambulance Services, following emergencies from the heart of the operations centre to the critical decisions of paramedics on the front line.

programme.title: If You're Listening - Episode 29
programme.desc: Ever watch the news and think "wow that's unprecedented". Well turns out that's not always quite true. Matt Bevan examines how what's happening now has probably happened before, to figure out what we can learn from history.

programme.title: Voices of Independence - PNG Kiap - John Hocknull
programme.desc: John Hocknull was a Patrol Officer in Papua New Guinea, locally they were known as Kiaps. They assisted Papua New Guinea on their road to independence.

programme.title: Voices of Independence - Sean Dorney

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 188
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Lorna Dunkley.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 188
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Spring: Grow a Salad Patch & Vertical Garden
programme.desc: Costa starts a salad patch, Josh plants up a green wall, Tammy taste tests unusual citrus, Millie visits a regional community united by native plants, and we stroll through a country garden that has colour for all seasons.

programme.title: Running Dry
programme.desc: The world is running out of water. Climate change, mismanagement and geopolitics are a drying up our reservoirs. The ripple effect is leaving millions struggling - there is hope but we must make every drop count.

programme.title: The Pacific - PNG 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: A special episode of The Pacific celebrating the 50th anniversary of PNG's independence. Join us as we reflect on 50 years of nationhood - the successes, and the challenges - plus what comes next for PNG in the years ahead.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - PNG Independence 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Sam Wykes and Michael Chow are in Port Moresby to mark Papua New Guinea's 50 years of independence. Celebrate PNG's rich history of culture, resilience and sporting excellence with stories and achievements of athletes.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 170
programme.desc: In our fast-moving world, we unpack the latest in politics, shifting national affairs and the global events shaping our lives. Guest host Melissa Clarke asks the tough questions on the big issues to the key decision makers.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple S3 E04 - Ordeal By Innocence (Part 2)
programme.desc: Agatha Christie’s much-loved female detective, Miss Marple continues her reign as the grande dame of the genre.

programme.title: The Six Million Dollar Man S3 E03 - Pilot Error
programme.desc: Lee Majors stars as Steve Austin, a U.S. astronaut who is critically injured upon re-entry, and whose damaged limbs are replaced with bionic, atomic-powered appendages. Now equipped with impressive capabilities, Austin uses his powers to fight for justice.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S9 E10 - The Sound Of Murder
programme.desc: Famed mystery writer Jessica Fletcher has a gift for solving mysteries and murder always follows her around, whether it be to the houses of her seemingly endless number of friends, nieces, and nephews, or right in her hometown.

programme.title: Mission Impossible S3 E13 - The Mind of Stefan Miklos
programme.desc: From behind the Iron Curtain to the jungles of Central America, Mission: Impossible really amps up the action with a parade of double agents, a chameleon-like assassin, and even a female dictator.

programme.title: The Six Million Dollar Man S3 E03 - Pilot Error
programme.desc: Lee Majors stars as Steve Austin, a U.S. astronaut who is critically injured upon re-entry, and whose damaged limbs are replaced with bionic, atomic-powered appendages. Now equipped with impressive capabilities, Austin uses his powers to fight for justice.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S9 E10 - The Sound Of Murder
programme.desc: Famed mystery writer Jessica Fletcher has a gift for solving mysteries and murder always follows her around, whether it be to the houses of her seemingly endless number of friends, nieces, and nephews, or right in her hometown.

programme.title: Frasier S1 E24 - My Coffee With Niles
programme.desc: FRASIER is set in Seattle, WA, which chronicles the lives of an eloquent radio show host Dr. Frasier Crane, his brazen radio producer Roz, his high-brow brother Niles, their crotchety father Martin and his quirky live-in nurse Daphne.

programme.title: Two Tickets to Paradise
programme.desc: When two weddings are ruined by both the bride and groom getting left at the altar, they still decide to take their honeymoons, not knowing they are heading to the same resort in Hawaii.

programme.title: Bewitched S5 E20 - Mrs. Stephens, Where Are You
programme.desc: Another year of marriage between mortal and witch has the Stephens trying to cope with Samantha's meddling, magical family and their daughter's entrance into nursery school.

programme.title: I Dream Of Jeannie S5 E17 - The Solid Gold Jeannie
programme.desc: An astronaut's life is thrown into chaos when he discovers a bottle that contains a beautiful female genie.

programme.title: Mission Impossible S3 E13 - The Mind of Stefan Miklos
programme.desc: From behind the Iron Curtain to the jungles of Central America, Mission: Impossible really amps up the action with a parade of double agents, a chameleon-like assassin, and even a female dictator.

programme.desc: Agatha Christie’s much-loved female detective, Miss Marple continues her reign as the grande dame of the genre.

programme.title: Room For Rent
programme.desc: Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with a younger guest. Desperate for love, she is willing to eliminate anyone hindering her pursuit of happiness, and a chilling tale of obsession unfolds.

programme.title: Rooftop
programme.desc: A group of friends invites Paul to a secret party on their campus rooftop. When a prank accidentally kills Paul, the friends cover up the incident and promised never to disclose it. Paul vows to take revenge by becoming a vicious ghost to haunt them into taking responsibility for their actions.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Evie
programme.desc: When young Evie discovers a cursed necklace washed up on the beach, she is unaware of the malevolent force tied to it. As the necklace's dark power begins to grip her, she inadvertently awakens a deadly water demon intent on claiming her and everyone she holds dear.

programme.title: Get in the Dark
programme.desc: A reporter hears three horror stories when investigating a case of the paper doll spirit 20 years ago. Miss Qiao had died in vain then, and her butler paid a paper craftsman to make a paper doll to be buried with her. Miss Qiao’s spirit is revived to take revenge when the doll’s eyes are drawn, and a series of horrible events begins to happen...

programme.title: The Windmill Massacre
programme.desc: Jennifer joins a tour to explore the renowned windmills of the Netherlands. As their tour coach breaks down on the way, they seek refuge in a creepy shed near a sinister windmill with a dark history. When some tour members suddenly disappear, Jennifer discovers a shared secret among them, linking their fates in a chilling revelation.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help ‘victims’ in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer…

programme.title: 7ujuh
programme.desc: 7 friends go on a road trip to a remote bungalow run by a village head and his daughter Suri. They host a party and ask Suri to help. Things spiral out of control and Suri is raped. Before killing herself, she curses them to be haunted in their dreams. As the friends are killed off one by one, they must break the curse to escape their deadly fate.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jing Wen, a struggling drama student, takes on a modelling job to help cover her tuition costs. As she becomes a model for an enigmatic artist specializing in expressive human body sketches, Jing Wen accidentally uncovers a shocking truth, plunging her into a desperate fight for survival.

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: When a young woman dies in a car crash, it's up to the Coroner's Office to trigger an investigation into an accident that may have involved foul play.

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera (S3)
programme.desc: A strange, jet-fast shadow figure crosses the path of a man driving late at night in Maine. A terrifying poltergeist threatens a couple in Malaysia. An elk hunter in Canada captures two separate bigfoots.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: In 2019, Jim's daughter, Elesha, lost her job and needed a place to stay so she moved. Moving in with Jim however, dealing with the hoard has been the most difficult part of her life.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Five women share their harrowing accounts of abduction and imprisonment. They discuss what happens when the news coverage dies down and how they've healed from the trauma they experienced.

programme.title: The Torso Killer Confessions
programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti continues his mission to tie Cottingham to additional murders and to get him to confess to more cold-case homicides.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: First-timers and frequent flyers get booked, including the son of a deputy who is charged with stealing a dog, and an intoxicated gentleman comes back to see his favourite policeman.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)
programme.desc: After a night out with friends, vulnerable India Chipchase is lured into a cab by a stranger promising to get her home safely. The following day, her body is found raped and strangled to death.

programme.title: The Braemar Hill Murders
programme.desc: In April 1985, two western teenagers studying in Hong Kong were set upon by a gang of Chinese youths, who proceeded to torture and stab them to death.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A family faces off with violent attackers trying to rob their jewelry store; two young women flee from a driver out to get them on a terrifying road trip; convenience and crime collide at a bank ATM.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A gas station worker faces down the barrel of a gun and is ordered to empty her registers; a man running an errand goes on a high speed chase to elude carjackers.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When a loving wife and mother is found stabbed to death inside her home, a team of investigators dedicate eight years to finding her killer.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 18
programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 1
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S2 ep 10
programme.desc: Since the end of Season 1, Par Jack (Benjie Paras) has made his ghost whispering ability a full-time business and is now a popular Ghost Whisperer in the country. Still with the help of his sidekicks, Nik and Bur, they now conduct business at their new facility, Day Scare Center.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 18
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. programme.title: Kurdapya ep 13
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.
